title: Plan for living
creator_contributor_role: Australian National Film Board, production company

Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Australia - Description and travel

description: Shows scenes where early settlers landed in Australia; early views of the cities of Australia; construction of buildings post 1949 and general living conditions and development of the cities of Australia.
